name: Tomato Farm (gmollgmollgames)
description:
Welcome to Tomato Farm!

Click on the seed to begin the game. Click tomatoes to collect them, and press B to spend 20 tomatoes to buy a new seed. Click on the ground to plant the seed, and keep growing tomatoes until you get to 1000!

Watch out for rabbits and worms! Click on them to stop them, or press T to buy a rabbit trap for 40 tomatoes.

This game has LEGENDARY music and graphics
